com.solacesystems.jcsmp.protocol

Interface CSMPChannel

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CSMPControllerChannel, CSMPPublisherChannel, CSMPSubscriberChannel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControllerChannel, TcpChannel, TcpClientChannel

    public interface CSMPChannel
    CSMPChannel defines the channel control interfaces.

      • getChannelProperties

      • isAutoReconnector

        boolean isAutoReconnector()
        Checks to see if the underlying channel is an auto-reconnector. This is a temporary measure applicable to avoid rewriting the pub/sub reconnecting logic at the channel level during the multi-iteration consolidation on client channels. When an auto-reconnector channel delivers an Exception, it means it has already tried (and failed) reconnection tasks, and no further reconnection logic should be executed. If the channel is NOT an auto-reconnector (this method returned false), the Producer or Consumer may perform reconnection logic.
        Returns:
        true if the channel is an auto-reconnector, false otherwise.

      • isUserCloseable

        boolean isUserCloseable()
        Returns:
        result
